products.embedding_text:
**Title:** Samsung Galaxy S24+ Plus 5g SM-S926B/DS 256GB 12GB RAM

**Category:** Smartphones

**Price:** $875.00

**Key Facts:**

* 50MP camera with AI capabilities
* 12GB RAM and 256GB storage
* Exynos 2400 processor
* Android 14 operating system
* 6.7-inch display
* Circle to Search feature for quick image recognition
* Live Translate for real-time voice translations
* Note Assist for note-taking and organization
* Generative Edit for photo editing
* Chat Assist for writing assistance

**Title:** SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra Dual SIM 12GB RAM 256 GB Storage

**Category:** Mobile Phones

**Price:** $1259.0 (18% discount)

**Key Facts:**

* **Display:** Dynamic AMOLED 6.8" screen, 1440x3088 resolution, 120Hz refresh rate
* **Rear Camera:** 200MP wide-angle, 10MP periscope telephoto, 10MP telephoto, 12MP ultra-wide-angle
* **Front Camera:** 12MP wide-angle
* **Performance:** Snapdragon 888 Gen 3, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage
* **Battery:** 5000mAh
* **Operating System:** Android 14
* **Connectivity:** 5G, dual nano-SIM, eSIM support

**Title**: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Cell Phone, 256GB

**Category**: Mobile Phone

**Price**: $859.99

**Key Facts**:

* 50MP camera with Dual Recording for capturing both main and selfie angles simultaneously
* 256GB storage capacity for ample multimedia and app storage
* 6.2-inch display with Eye Comfort Shield for reduced eye strain
* Super Fast Charging capability for quick battery power-ups
* Live Translate feature for real-time language translation
* Note Assist for automated note summarization, formatting, and translation
* Generative Edit for image editing and AI-powered object removal and background filling
* Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor for enhanced performance and seamless multitasking

Title: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra 256GB AI Smartphone

Price: $1299.99

Key Facts:

* 256GB Storage Capacity
* 6.8-inch AMOLED Display
* 200MP Quad-Camera System
* 100x Zoom
* Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Processor
* S Pen Included

Title: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Dual SIM, SM-S921B/DS Dual Sim EU/UK Model 8GB Ram 256 GB Storage Factory Unlocked AI Smartphone, (Onyx Black)
Category: Smartphones
Price: $780.0
Key Facts:
- Operating System: Android 14
- Memory Storage: 8 GB RAM, 256 GB Storage
- Display: 6.2 Inches, 2340 x 1080 Resolution
- Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi, LTE
- Features: Samsung AI, Circle to Search with Google, Live Translate, Note Assist, Generative Edit, Chat Assist, Eye Comfort Shield
Description Summary: The SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 offers advanced AI features like real-time translations, note organization, and generative editing. It boasts a 50MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and a large, bright display with Eye Comfort Shield for enhanced user experience.
Detailed Specifications:
- Dimensions: 5 x 3 x 1 inches
- Weight: 5.9 ounces
- Battery: 4000 Milliamp Hours
